Question: In the movie 'Gangs of New York' (2002), which of the following statements about the characters played by Leonardo DiCaprio and Liam Neeson is true?
Options:
A. Leonardo DiCaprio played the role of Amsterdam Vallon.
B. Liam Neeson portrayed the character Priest Vallon.
C. Both actors portrayed the roles of brothers.
D. Leonardo DiCaprio was the main antagonist in the film.
Answer: Leonardo DiCaprio played the role of Amsterdam Vallon., Liam Neeson portrayed the character Priest Vallon., Both actors portrayed the roles of brothers.
